name: Red & Blue (Lychees)
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021 - The theme was "Joined Together".

A fast paced auto-runner where you control two characters at once and try to reach the end of the level. Careful use of the slam ability will let you launch your partner over obstacles, but be mindful of timing!

Also has an unlockable endless mode for those who finish the main levels! I would have loved to have made a leaderboard but feel free to post your scores in comments if you'd like :)

Credits:

Music - https://opengameart.org/users/dst

Font - Gameplay from dafont
